account.title: Account
account.description: Manage your account settings and preferences.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Manage your team and invite new members to collaborate.

profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Name
api_key_security_rules: Never share your API key with others
Do not place the key in public code repositories
If you suspect the key is compromised, revoke it immediately
The key is displayed only once - save it in a secure location
profile.active_api_key: You have an active API key created
profile.api_key_warning: This key will not be displayed again. Save it in a secure location.
profile.generate_new_key_warning: Generating a new key will invalidate the current key. All applications using the old key will stop working.
profile.deactivate_key_warning: This action is irreversible. All applications using this key will stop working immediately.
profile.no_api_key: You don't have an API key yet. Generate one to use our API.
profile.password_requirements: Password should contain at least 8 characters.
profile.password_changed: Your password has been successfully changed.
profile.password_change_error: Failed to change password. Please try again.
profile.delete_account_warning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain before performing this action.
profile.delete_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
profile.delete_account_description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all of your data from our servers.
profile.account_deleted_description: Your account has been successfully deleted.
profile.copied_description: API key has been copied to clipboard.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Manage your team and invite new members to collaborate.
organization.invite_success_description: Invitation has been sent to the provided email address and the invitation link has been copied to clipboard.
organization.invite_error_description: An error occurred while sending the invitation
organization.not_in_organization: You are not a member of any organization.
organization.remove_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this user from the organization?
organization.leave_confirmation: Are you sure you want to leave the organization? You will not have access to organization resources.
organization.member_removed: User has been removed from the organization

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.account_notifications_description: Receive email messages about activity on your account.
notifications.marketing_emails_description: Receive information about new products, features and other news.
notifications.social_notifications_description: Receive notifications about friend invitations, followers and other activities.
notifications.security_notifications_description: Receive important notifications about your account security.
